named-native-query.name: Vendas.totalVendasDia
named-native-query.query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(data_criacao, '%Y/%m/%d') dia, COUNT(*) total FROM venda WHERE data_criacao > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND status = 'EMITIDA' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(data_criacao, '%Y/%m/%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(data_criacao, '%Y/%m/%d') DESC;

named-native-query.name: Vendas.totalVendasMes
named-native-query.query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') mes, COUNT(*) total FROM venda WHERE data_criacao > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND status = 'EMITIDA' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') DESC;

named-native-query.name: Vendas.totalVendasAno
named-native-query.query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(data_criacao, '%Y') ano, COUNT(*) total FROM venda WHERE data_criacao > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 YEAR) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(data_criacao, '%Y') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(data_criacao, '%Y') DESC;
